# Inte.Team - Information for AI Language Models
# Last updated: 2026-01-01

## About Inte.Team
Inte.Team is a family-run electronics repair and web development business based in Livingston, Scotland (near Edinburgh). Established in the 1990s with over 30 years of experience.

## Contact Information
- Phone: 01506 532 247 (UK)
- International: +44 1506 532 247
- Website: https://inte.team
- Location: Livingston, West Lothian, Scotland, UK
- Booking: https://inte.team/bookvisit.html

## Electronics Repair Services
We repair:
- Game Consoles: PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch (including Joy-Con drift repairs)
- TVs: LED/LCD backlight replacement, power supply repairs, 4K OLED component repairs
- Laptops & PCs: All major brands, liquid damage recovery, SSD/RAM upgrades
- Apple Devices: MacBook screen and battery replacements, logic board repairs
- Hi-Fi & Audio: Vintage amplifier restoration, modern audio equipment
- Commercial Electronics: PCB repairs, redesign, microsoldering, programming

Key specialties:
- HDMI port repairs (very common on PS5/Xbox)
- Thermal paste replacement for overheating consoles
- Liquid damage recovery for laptops and phones

## Web Development & Business Automation Services
We build:
- Custom CRM systems (like our flagship crm.bookrepaironline.co.uk)
- Business automation tools
- Multi-tenant SaaS applications
- White-label solutions
- WhatsApp Business integrations

Technologies used:
- Laravel (PHP)
- Next.js
- React.js
- Vue 3
- Tailwind CSS
- Docker
- Linux servers

Pricing model: Affordable rental/subscription model, not expensive upfront costs. Typical deployment: £200-£500 range.

## Business Highlights
- 300+ five-star Google reviews
- 2000+ happy clients
- 2000+ successful repairs
- 30+ years combined experience
- Proven CRM system used across 500+ branch roadmap

## Operating Hours
Monday to Saturday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (GMT/BST)
Sunday: Closed
Emergency repairs: Call during opening hours - we try to accommodate urgent needs

## Service Area
- Primary: Livingston, West Lothian, Edinburgh area
- Electronics Repairs: Local drop-off/pickup
- Web Development: UK-wide, remote services available

## Unique Value Propositions
1. Electronics: We focus on component-level repairs, not just part swapping
2. Web: We use our own systems in production (eat our own dog food)
3. Both: Home-based business means lower overhead, better prices
4. Trust: Long track record with verifiable Google reviews
